name: Laser Mazer AR/VR
description:
Walk, dodge, crouch, hide, dance, and squeeze your way past deadly lasers in this challenging AR/VR puzzle game.

Laser Mazer is played by walking around in the real world, so you'll need a large flat space that's free of obstacles. Outdoors is best, but a simple lock button makes the game playable in any-sized space.

Put your mind and feet to the test with 40 challenging levels, plus 12 new "Survival Modes."
